name: PAT Shooter PJ
description:
Buttons:

Arrow keys: Move

Z: Toggle Shooting

X: Fire Missiles

This is a game made by Banjamin Soule and modded by me, Jordan Kloosterman.

Please check out the original game here:
http://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=11093&tid=1867&autoplay=1#pp
